channel.title: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]
channel.description: when someone dies on my server the items dissapear instead of dropping and staying on the floor can someone tell me where i change this plz

item.title: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Nonono, don’t use the createItem method. Use this one:

ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false);

Make sure you add it too your youdied method! If you don’t know how too do it pm me.

Read full topic

item.title: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]
item.dc:creator: @t0ast t0ast
item.description:
@t0ast wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:16, topic:378083”][quote author=t0ast link=topic=473968.msg3466650#msg3466650 date=1294958513]

Instead of C
try playerId
or PlayerId
can’t remember if its Cap on the first letter

that’s done it, but i can’t pick stuff up now… could you add my msn and help me?
[/quote]

Spent some time looking for the code apparently the code is this

			server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(this, droppedItem, absX, absY, playerItemsN[slot], playerId);

Its just adding the item to the server the other way is to make sure players can’t use cheat clients so thats why that way doesnt work…[/quote]

where would i put that?

[/quote]

that’s done it, but i can’t pick stuff up now… could you add my msn and help me?[/quote]

Spent some time looking for the code apparently the code is this

			server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(this, droppedItem, absX, absY, playerItemsN[slot], playerId);

Its just adding the item to the server the other way is to make sure players can’t use cheat clients so thats why that way doesnt work…

item.title: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]
item.dc:creator: @t0ast t0ast
item.description:
@t0ast wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:9, topic:378083”][quote author=t0ast link=topic=473968.msg3466239#msg3466239 date=1294925563]
i’m having the same problem so i tried adding this and it just made my invent drop on the floor instead of just the item i clicked?
[/quote]wth he said on death…
not everything…

If you want things to drop

look for

            sendFrame126("No.", 141756);
            sendFrame126(""+GetItemName(droppedItem), 14184);
            sendFrame126(getMessageA(droppedItem),14182);
            sendFrame126(getMessageB(droppedItem),14183);
            sendFrame164(14170);
            publicDroppendItem = droppedItem; 
	    return;
	    }
			// createGroundItem(droppedItem, absX, absY, c);
			deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);
			updateRequired = true;
			savegame(false);
		}
	}

and remove the //[/quote]

now what D:

Read full topic

item.title: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“t0ast, post:8, topic:378083”]i’m having the same problem so i tried adding this and it just made my invent drop on the floor instead of just the item i clicked?[/quote]wth he said on death…
not everything…

If you want things to drop

look for

            sendFrame126("No.", 141756);
            sendFrame126(""+GetItemName(droppedItem), 14184);
            sendFrame126(getMessageA(droppedItem),14182);
            sendFrame126(getMessageB(droppedItem),14183);
            sendFrame164(14170);
            publicDroppendItem = droppedItem; 
	    return;
	    }
			// createGroundItem(droppedItem, absX, absY, c);
			deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);
			updateRequired = true;
			savegame(false);
		}
	}

and remove the //

item.source: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]

item.title: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]
item.dc:creator: @t0ast t0ast
item.description:
@t0ast wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:7, topic:378083”]that is the command that says items are just being deleted
instead of dropped ill find you an exact thing

for Delta

for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) {
	try {
		if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 19999) {
			replaceBarrows();
			server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(this, playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId);
			deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]);
 
		}
	} catch(Exception e) {  }
}
for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
	try {
		int item = playerEquipment[r];
		if((item > 0) && (item < 19999)) {
			remove(item, r);
		}
	} catch(Exception e) { sM("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); }
}
		server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(this, playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId);

is the command saying Spawn the items on the ground
Good luck…[/quote]

i’m having the same problem so i tried adding this and it just made my invent drop on the floor instead of just the item i clicked?

Read full topic
item.source: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]

item.title: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

that is the command that says items are just being deleted
instead of dropped ill find you an exact thing

for Delta

for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) {
	try {
		if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 19999) {
			replaceBarrows();
			server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(this, playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId);
			deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]);
 
		}
	} catch(Exception e) {  }
}
for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
	try {
		int item = playerEquipment[r];
		if((item > 0) && (item < 19999)) {
			remove(item, r);
		}
	} catch(Exception e) { sM("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); }
}
		server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(this, playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId);

is the command saying Spawn the items on the ground
Good luck…

Read full topic

item.title: Items dissapear instead of appearing on the floor upon death[317]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

In playerassistant.java search

public void giveLife() {

and a few lines under you should see

c.getItems().deleteAllItems();

under that add

c.getItems().dropAllItems();
